products_page.title: Our Products
products_page.description: High-performance brazing, welding, and filler metal solutions for industrial applications.

major_products.title: RP Phos
major_products.short_description: Copper–phosphorus brazing alloys for copper and copper–brass joints.
major_products.description:
RP Phos brazing alloys are filler metals formulated primarily for copper-to-copper and copper-to-brass joints. They are widely used in HVAC/R, plumbing, and electrical assemblies due to their excellent capillary flow and ability to create sound joints at relatively low brazing temperatures in air.

Phosphorus enables self-fluxing on copper, while optional silver additions improve ductility, reduce melting range, and enhance gap-bridging and fillet formation.
key_technical_features: Typical tensile strength: 370–415 MPa
Excellent capillary action for tight joint clearances
Self-fluxing on copper joints
Silver additions improve ductility and gap filling
Flux required for brass joints; avoid sulfur-bearing environments

sub_products.name: RP PHOS 0
sub_products.short_description: Excellent liquidity alloy for tight fitting copper joints.

sub_products.name: RP PHOS 1
sub_products.short_description: Cost-effective alloy with good fluidity.

sub_products.name: RP PHOS 2
sub_products.short_description: Low silver with high phosphorus for very good fluidity.

sub_products.name: RP PHOS 5
sub_products.short_description: Moderate liquidity with improved gap filling.

sub_products.name: RP PHOS 5HP
sub_products.short_description: High phosphorus preform alloy for improved liquidity.

sub_products.name: RP PHOS 6
sub_products.short_description: Designed to replicate RP PHOS 15 performance at lower cost.

sub_products.name: RP PHOS 6HP
sub_products.short_description: Fluid alloy for controlled clearances and automated brazing.

sub_products.name: RP PHOS 15
sub_products.short_description: High silver alloy with superior ductility and wide gap capability.

major_products.title: RP Silver
major_products.short_description: Silver brazing alloys for strong, ductile, and leak-tight joints.
major_products.description:
RP Silver brazing alloys consist of cadmium-free and cadmium-bearing Ag-Cu-Zn based filler metals designed to deliver excellent wetting, low brazing temperatures, and high joint strength.

These alloys are widely used in HVAC, refrigeration, plumbing, electrical, medical, food, aeronautical, and general industrial applications.
key_technical_features: No cadmium – avoiding toxic fume hazards and meeting RoHS and similar restrictions for food/medical and general industrial applications
Low brazing temperatures with good flow – Tin-modified grades such as Ag-56Sn types offer among the lowest melting ranges and excellent flow among cadmium-free families
Excellent capillary action and minimizing heat input to parts
Suitable for most steels, stainless steels, copper/brass/bronze and many nickel alloys

sub_categories.title: Cadmium Free Alloy
sub_categories.description: Cadmium-free silver brazing alloys designed to eliminate toxic cadmium fumes while delivering strong, ductile, leak-tight joints at relatively low brazing temperatures.
key_technical_features: No cadmium – safe and RoHS compliant
Excellent flow and capillary action
Suitable for steels, stainless steels, copper alloys, brass, bronze, and nickel alloys
Available in rods, wires, rings, strips, pastes, and flux-coated forms

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 25
sub_products.short_description:
Cost-effective cadmium-free alloy with good flow characteristics.

Ideal for general-purpose brazing of ferrous and non-ferrous metals in HVAC and plumbing applications.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 30
sub_products.short_description:
Versatile alloy offering excellent wetting and capillary flow.

Suitable for brazing copper, brass, and steel assemblies with moderate joint clearances.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 35
sub_products.short_description:
Higher silver content for improved ductility and joint strength.

Recommended for applications requiring enhanced mechanical properties and corrosion resistance.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 38T
sub_products.short_description:
Versatile silver brazing alloy with 38% silver content. Offers good flow properties and joint strength for various metals.

Suitable for industrial applications requiring reliable performance in moderate temperature ranges.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 40Ni2
sub_products.short_description:
Silver brazing alloy with 40% silver and 2% nickel. Provides enhanced corrosion resistance and strength, especially for stainless steel.

Ideal for carbide tool tipping and joining difficult-to-wet metals.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 40T
sub_products.short_description:
Assessment of 40% silver content for general purpose brazing. Exhibits good ductility and gap-filling capabilities.

Widely used in fabrication where decent mechanical properties are required.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 45
sub_products.short_description:
Standard 45% silver alloy offering excellent fluidity. Creates clean, strong joints with minimal fillet build-up.

A preferred choice for food and medical equipment due to its cadmium-free composition and high purity.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 45T
sub_products.short_description:
Tin-bearing 45% silver alloy for lower brazing temperatures. Improves wetting usage on diverse base metals.

Excellent for HVAC components and delicate assemblies requiring controlled heat input.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 50
sub_products.short_description:
High-silver (50%) alloy for superior corrosion resistance. Meets stringent industry standards for critical joints.

Commonly used in marine and chemical processing environments for long-lasting durability.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 50Ni2
sub_products.short_description:
50% silver alloy fortified with nickel. Delivers exceptional strength and resistance to interfacial corrosion.

Perfect for tungsten carbide tooling and stainless steel pipelines.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 54N
sub_products.short_description:
Specialized 54% silver alloy with nickel. Offers high temperature strength and oxidation resistance.

Specified for aerospace and high-stress industrial components.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 56T
sub_products.short_description:
Premium 56% silver alloy with tin. Features the lowest melting point for cadmium-free grades, ensuring minimal distortion.

Ideal for color-matching stainless steel and brazing food-grade equipment.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 56Ni2
sub_products.short_description:
56% silver alloy with nickel for maximum corrosion resistance. Provides superior wetting on stainless steel and carbides.

Used extensively in critical medical and marine applications.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 60
sub_products.short_description:
High-purity 60% silver alloy. Offers excellent electrical conductivity and ductility for specialized uses.

Suitable for electrical contacts and high-quality silverware fabrication.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 61
sub_products.short_description:
61% silver alloy for specific industrial requirements. Combines high silver benefits with controlled melting range.

Applicable in precision instrument assembly and electronics.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 65
sub_products.short_description:
Very high silver content (65%) for exceptional corrosion resistance. Ensures joint integrity in harsh environments.

Often chosen for chemical apparatus and premium architectural metalwork.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 72
sub_products.short_description:
Eutectic 72% silver alloy. Provides standard-setting performance for vacuum brazing and electronic applications.

Delivers the highest electrical conductivity and strongest bond for copper-silver systems.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 49
sub_products.short_description:
Specialty 49% silver alloy with manganese. Designed for brazing carbides and difficult-to-wet alloys.

Provides robust mechanical strength for cutting tools and heavy machinery.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER 100
sub_products.short_description:
Pure Silver (99.95%) filler metal. Used for applications requiring maximum electrical & thermal conductivity.

Ideal for specialized electronic components and chemical industry requirements.

sub_categories.title: Cadmium Bearing Alloy
sub_categories.description: Cadmium-bearing silver brazing alloys formulated for extremely low brazing temperatures, narrow melting ranges, and exceptional capillary flow where cadmium use is permitted.
key_technical_features: Very low melting points
Exceptional capillary flow
Broad base-metal compatibility
Requires proper fume extraction due to cadmium toxicity

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-20
sub_products.short_description:
Cadmium-bearing 20% silver alloy. Offers broad melting range for bridging large gaps and filling loose fits.

Suitable for general purpose joining where lower silver content provides cost efficiency. Ventilation required.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-25
sub_products.short_description:
25% silver alloy with cadmium for lower brazing temperatures. Provides good wetting on copper and steel.

Economical choice for general manufacturing repairs. Use with adequate fume extraction.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-30
sub_products.short_description:
30% silver alloy offering a balance of properties. Good flow and moderate melting temperature for diverse assemblies.

Commonly used in refrigeration and electrical components. Requires safety precautions during use.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-35
sub_products.short_description:
35% silver alloy providing excellent capillary action. Flows freely at lower temperatures to minimize heat distortion.

Ideal for joining dissimilar metals in HVAC systems. Cadmium safety protocols apply.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-40
sub_products.short_description:
40% silver alloy with superior fluidity. Formulated for high-strength joints in close-fitting assemblies.

A standard industry grade for reliable performance. Ensure proper ventilation.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-43
sub_products.short_description:
43% silver alloy delivering very narrow melting range. Solidifies quickly to prevent movement during cooling.

Excellent for production line brazing where speed is critical. Contains cadmium.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-45
sub_products.short_description:
Premium 45% silver alloy with the lowest flow temperature. Exceptional penetration for tight clearances.

Minimizes heat effect on base metals. Mandatory fume extraction required.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-50
sub_products.short_description:
High-silver (50%) cadmium alloy for max fluidity & corrosion resistance. Meets highest specification requirements.

Used for critical joints in marine and aerospace. Strict safety handling advised.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-50Ni3
sub_products.short_description:
50% silver alloy with nickel & cadmium. Combines low melting point with enhanced corrosion resistance.

Specially designed for carbide tipping and stainless steel brazing. Caution: Contains cadmium.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-67
sub_products.short_description:
Specialized 67% silver alloy. Extremely low melting point for delicate assemblies sensitive to heat.

Used in specialized electronics and instrument manufacturing. Handle with care.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-44
sub_products.short_description:
44% silver alloy formulated for specific flow characteristics. Provides strong bonds on difficult-to-wet surfaces.

Suitable for diverse industrial repair applications. Use appropriate safety gear.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-12
sub_products.short_description:
Economical 12% silver alloy with cadmium. High temperature brazing filler for coarse fit-ups.

Budget-friendly option for non-critical steel assemblies. Requires ventilation.

sub_products.name: RP SILVER Cd-72
sub_products.short_description:
High-purity 72% silver alloy with trace cadmium. optimized for specific electrical conductivity needs.

Delivers premium joint quality for electrical contacts. Safety protocols required.

major_products.title: RP Copper
major_products.short_description: Copper and bronze welding alloys for high-quality, corrosion-resistant joints.
major_products.description:
RP Copper welding alloys are filler metals and consumables formulated to join pure copper and copper-based alloys while managing challenges such as high thermal conductivity, oxide formation, and porosity during welding operations.

Bronze welding alloys, where tin, silicon, or aluminum are principal additions, are used to weld bronzes, brasses, steels for surfacing, and dissimilar joints with good corrosion resistance and aesthetic color matching.
key_technical_features: Deoxidized fillers with silicon and manganese reduce porosity in oxygen-bearing copper
Excellent corrosion resistance, especially with silicon bronze alloys
Compatible with TIG, MIG, and torch welding processes
Argon shielding gas recommended for TIG and MIG welding
Filler selection should match the base alloy for optimal performance

sub_products.name: RP-WELD 92
sub_products.short_description:
Silicon bronze welding alloy with excellent corrosion resistance.

Ideal for welding copper alloys, bronzes, and dissimilar metal joints in marine and industrial applications.

sub_products.name: RP-WELD 58 (RBCuZn-B)
sub_products.short_description:
Low-fuming brass welding rod acting as a versatile filler metal. Excellent for braze-welding steel and cast iron.

Provides strong, ductile joints with good color match to yellow brass.

sub_products.name: RP-WELD 58 (RBCuZn-C)
sub_products.short_description:
Low-fuming bronze alloy with higher hardness. Ideal for high-strength joints and wear-resistant overlays.

Maintains good mechanical properties at elevated temperatures.

sub_products.name: RP-WELD 98
sub_products.short_description:
Deoxidized copper welding wire (ERCu). Designed for joining pure copper to produce high-conductivity joints.

Ensures porosity-free welds in electrical bus bars and copper plumbing.

sub_products.name: RP-WELD 59
sub_products.short_description:
Naval brass welding rod (RBCuZn-A). Contains tin to improve strength and corrosion resistance in marine environments.

Suitable for brazing and welding copper, bronze, and steel components.

sub_products.name: RP-WELD 94
sub_products.short_description:
Phosphor bronze welding wire (ERCuSn-A). Excellent for welding bronze, brass, and copper-to-steel.

Provides good wear resistance and strength for bearing surfaces.

sub_products.name: RP-WELD 91
sub_products.short_description:
High-tin phosphor bronze alloy (ERCuSn-C). Offers superior hardness and wear resistance for heavy-duty overlays.

Used for repairing gears, bearings, and high-strength bronze castings.

sub_products.name: RP-WELD 90
sub_products.short_description:
Aluminum bronze alloy (ERCuAl-A1). Resistant to corrosion, erosion, and seawater attack.

Ideal for marine hardware, propellers, and chemical processing equipment.

sub_products.name: RP-WELD 88
sub_products.short_description:
High-strength aluminum bronze (ERCuAl-A2). Excellent for joining aluminum bronzes, silicon bronzes, and copper-nickel.

Widely used for ship fittings, valves, and wear-resistant surfacing.

major_products.title: RP Braze
major_products.short_description: Brass brazing alloys for strong, economical structural joints.
major_products.description:
RP Braze brass brazing alloys are copper–zinc filler metals used for high-temperature brazing and braze-welding of steels, copper alloys, cast irons, and carbide.

They provide a cost-effective alternative to silver brazing alloys, offering excellent fillet formation, wider gap-bridging capability, and strong structural joints for fabrication and repair applications.
key_technical_features: Copper–zinc brass core system for strength and durability
Modified with elements such as Ni, Si, Sn, or small Ag additions to improve wetting, color, and corrosion resistance
Flows at higher temperatures than silver brazes
Excellent fillet-building and wide gap-bridging characteristics
Available in rods, wires, preforms, strips, powders, and pastes
Commonly used in tubular steel assemblies, heat exchangers, radiators, and carbide tool brazing

sub_products.name: RP BRAZE 90
sub_products.short_description:
High copper content brass alloy with excellent ductility.

Perfect for applications requiring superior corrosion resistance and easy cold working properties.

sub_products.name: RP BRAZE 80
sub_products.short_description:
Red brass brazing alloy (80% Cu). Offers excellent corrosion resistance and color match for copper piping.

Suitable for joining copper pipes and fittings in plumbing systems.

rows.value: Moderately high strength with good ductility

sub_products.name: RP BRAZE 70
sub_products.short_description:
Cartridge brass alloy (70% Cu). Combines high ductility with good strength for deep drawing applications.

Used for radiator cores, fasteners, and ammunition casings.

rows.value: Excellent cold workability and reliable corrosion resistance

sub_products.name: RP BRAZE 65
sub_products.short_description:
Standard yellow brass (65% Cu). Provides a good balance of strength and ductility for general fabrication.

Commonly used for lamp fixtures, hinges, and decorative metalwork.

rows.value: Good cold workability with moderate tensile strength
Excellent cold forming, poor hot formability

sub_products.name: RP BRAZE 63
sub_products.short_description:
Common brass alloy (63% Cu). versatile filler for brazing steels, malleable iron, and copper alloys.

Effective for general repair work and maintenance brazing.

rows.value: Mechanical parts, fasteners, connectors, low-lead components

sub_products.name: RP BRAZE 60
sub_products.short_description:
Muntz metal (60% Cu). High strength brass for structural brazing and architectural applications.

Provides good corrosion resistance and optimal color matching for architectural bronze.

rows.value: Higher strength and rigidity due to increased zinc content
Warm golden-yellow color with good polishability
